sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_ci_gs_content.GuidedSetupEntitlementsHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GuidedSetupEntitlementsHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GuidedSetupEntitlementsHelper = Class.create();
GuidedSetupEntitlementsHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    fetchEntitlements: function() {
        var entitlementArr = [];
	var entitlement = '';
        var conditions = '';
	var conditionsScript = '';

        var mappingGr = new GlideRecord("gs_entitlement_plugin_mapping");
	mappingGr.addActiveQuery();
        mappingGr.query();
        while (mappingGr.next()) {
            conditions = mappingGr.getValue('conditions');
            entitlement = mappingGr.getValue('entitlement');
            if (conditions.indexOf('source=') !== -1)
                conditionsScript = conditions.replace(/source=/g, "sn_lef.GlideEntitlement.hasLicenseForApp('");
            if (conditions.indexOf('^EQ') !== -1)
                conditionsScript = conditionsScript.replace("^EQ", "')");
            if (conditions.indexOf('^OR') !== -1)
                conditionsScript = conditionsScript.replaceAll("^OR", "') || ");
            if (conditions.indexOf('^') !== -1)
                conditionsScript = conditionsScript.replaceAll("^", "') && ");
            mappingGr.setValue('condition_script', conditionsScript);
            mappingGr.update();
            var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
            if (evaluator.evaluateScript(mappingGr, 'condition_script'))
                entitlementArr.push(entitlement);
        }
        return entitlementArr;
    },
    type: 'GuidedSetupEntitlementsHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-09-23 10:01:28</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>23f70d2e53431010af5addeeff7b128b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GuidedSetupEntitlementsHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="CI Guided Setup" source="sn_ci_gs_content">30f13c8d53521010af5addeeff7b121d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="CI Guided Setup">30f13c8d53521010af5addeeff7b121d</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_23f70d2e53431010af5addeeff7b128b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-09-23 12:48:19</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
